Q_DESC: Alice wants to send a message to Bob. In network a header and footer will be added with our message we all know that. Assume that the header is the preamble of one byte(01111110) is the alert message it says that some is coming to you. Alice thinks that what happened when preamble and her full message or partition of her message is equivalent. So, she will do the zero bit stuffing in her message only when consecutive five one present in her message. After that she sends the stuffed message and the technique of stuffing to bob and ask to receive the stuffed and then unstuff it to read the original message. Bob need to print the stuffed and unstuffed message.
